name: Chicken Salad
instructions: Grill or pan-fry the chicken breast until fully cooked, then slice into thin strips.
Chop cucumber, tomato, and red onion into bite-sized pieces.
In a large bowl, combine greens, chopped vegetables, and sliced chicken.
Drizzle olive oil and lemon juice over the salad.
Season with salt and pepper, toss well, and serve fresh.
